jenkins.plugins.publish__over__ssh.BapSs.execCommand: cd aob-tools WPDBNAME=`cat configuration.php | grep '$db ' | cut -d \' -f 2` WPDBUSER=`cat configuration.php | grep '$$user ' | cut -d \' -f 2` WPDBPASS=`cat configuration.php | grep '$password ' | cut -d \' -f 2` WPDBHOST=`cat configuration.php | grep '$host ' | cut -d \' -f 2 | cut -d : -f 1` WPDBPORT=`cat configuration.php | grep '$host ' | cut -d \' -f 2 | cut -d : -f 2` if [ "$WPDBPORT" == "$WPDBHOST" ]; then echo "Port non prÃ©sent pour le mysqldump" mysqldump -h $WPDBHOST -u $WPDBUSER -p$WPDBPASS $WPDBNAME > export_database.sql else echo "Port prÃ©sent pour le mysqldump" mysqldump -h $WPDBHOST -u $WPDBUSER -p$WPDBPASS $WPDBNAME -P $WPDBPORT > export_database.sql fi git add . -v git commit --author="Timothee Via Jenkins <timotheebarreteau@gmail.com>" -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash cd $HOME/HOME/Aob-Tools; git fetch site master git reset --hard site/master git push origin master -f
WPNAME='Aob-Tools' WPDBVERSION=`cat language/en-GB/en-GB.xml | grep "<version>" | cut -d '>' -f 2 | cut -d '<' -f 1` WPPLUGIN='' URL='http://www.aob-tools.com' TYPE='joomla' SERV='OVH ALOA.OVH' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@monit.aloa.ovh/RapportsMonitoring/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL&serveur=$SERV"
